precondition: The mouse cursor is hovering over the desktop.
expected_results: A context menu labeled 'Arrange Icons By ▸' will appear, containing options such as 'Refresh', 'Paste Shortcut', 'New', and 'Properties'. The cursor will change to a pointer hand shape.

precondition: The context menu on the desktop is open.
expected_results: The context menu will close and the 'Display Properties' window will open.

precondition: The 'Appearance' tab in the 'Display Properties' dialog box is open.
expected_results: The 'Active Window' preview will update to the 'Windows Classic' style, the 'Save As...' button will disappear, and a Recycle Bin icon will appear on the preview.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open with the 'Themes' tab active.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' tab will become active. The content area will change to display screen saver settings, including a 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu, a 'Wait' input field, a 'Settings' button, and a 'Preview' button.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open, and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active.
expected_results: A list of screensaver options will appear. The 'Settings' button will become inactive.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' tab in the 'Display Properties' dialog box is open.
action: Click the 'Screen saver' dropdown menu and select '3D FlowerBox'.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu will display '3D FlowerBox', the 'Wait' spinbox will change to '10', and the 'Settings' button will become active.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' tab of the 'Display Properties' dialog box is open.
expected_results: The selected screen saver settings will be applied.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' tab in the 'Display Properties' dialog box is open.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box will appear.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Home/Office Desk' power scheme is selected.
action: Click the 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu and select 'After 5 hours'.
expected_results: The monitor will automatically turn off after 5 hours of inactivity when using the 'Home/Office Desk' power scheme.

precondition: A dialog box titled 'Display Properties' is partially visible in the background.
action: Click on the title bar of the 'Display Properties' dialog box.
expected_results: The 'Display Properties' dialog box will move to the foreground and become fully visible.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open.
expected_results: The 'Display Properties' dialog box will close.
